import axios from 'axios'; import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './rightBar.scss'; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/authContext'; const RightBar = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchUsers = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('/users/relationships/' + currentUser.id); const users = response.data; setUsers(users); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; fetchUsers(); }, []); return (
{/*
Suggestions For You
Thành Long
Thành Long
List Friend

Thành Long online

Thành Long online

Thành Long online

Thành Long online

Thành Long online

*/}

User List

    {users.map((user) => (
  • {user.name}
    • ))}
); }; export default RightBar;
